name: Rambagh Palace
description: A curation of authentic living palaces, landmark hotels, resorts and safaris, RamBagh Palace is the hallmark of iconic hospitality across the globe. The brand is recognised for its warm and intuitive service and is the undisputed leader in Indian hospitality.
facilities: Air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, as well as access to a terrace,with private Parking
